Convert NetCDF Spatial Geometries to sf

Source: R/read_geometry.R
read_geometry.Rd

Attemps to convert a NetCDF-CF DSG Simple Geometry file into a sf data.frame.

read_geometry(nc_file)

Arguments

nc_file

A string file path to the nc file to be read.

Value

sf data.frame containing spatial geometry of type found in the NetCDF-CF DSG file.

References

https://github.com/twhiteaker/netCDF-CF-simple-geometry

Examples

huc_eta_nc <- tempfile()
file.copy(system.file('extdata','example_huc_eta.nc', package = 'ncdfgeom'),
         huc_eta_nc, overwrite = TRUE)
#> [1] TRUE

hucTimeseries <- ncdf4::nc_open(huc_eta_nc)

hucPolygons <- sf::read_sf(system.file('extdata','example_huc_eta.json', package = 'ncdfgeom'))
plot(sf::st_geometry(hucPolygons))
names(hucPolygons)
#>  [1] "TNMID"      "METASOURCE" "SOURCEDATA" "SOURCEORIG" "SOURCEFEAT"
#>  [6] "LOADDATE"   "GNIS_ID"    "AREAACRES"  "AREASQKM"   "STATES"    
#> [11] "HUC12"      "NAME"       "HUTYPE"     "HUMOD"      "TOHUC"     
#> [16] "NONCONTRIB" "NONCONTR_1" "SHAPE_Leng" "SHAPE_Area" "geometry"  

hucPolygons_nc <- ncdfgeom::ToNCDFSG(nc_file=huc_eta_nc,
                                      geomData = hucPolygons,
                                      instance_names = hucPolygons$HUC12,
                                      instance_dim_name = "station",
                                      variables = hucTimeseries$var)
#> Error: 'ToNCDFSG' is not an exported object from 'namespace:ncdfgeom'
huc_poly <- read_geometry(huc_eta_nc)
#> Error in check_netcdf(nc): Didn't find a geometry type attribute, nothing to do.
plot(sf::st_geometry(huc_poly))
#> Error in sf::st_geometry(huc_poly): object 'huc_poly' not found
names(huc_poly)
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'huc_poly' not found
